name: Sterile needle and syringe exchange program established
text: [§325-112]  Sterile needle and syringe exchange program established.  The director of health may establish a sterile needle and syringe exchange program.  The program shall be administered by the director or the director's designees.  The director is authorized to designate private providers of service to operate the program. [L 1992, c 152, pt of §2]
